word_mean: 脂肪，皮脂：为皮脂腺分泌的一种粘稠半流质分泌物，由脂肪和表皮生发层细胞脱落的上皮碎屑组成

sentence.Network_en: As a result, sebum production decreases, which reduces acne.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此, 减少皮脂的产生, 从而减少粉刺.

sentence.Network_en: Regulate sebum secretion, prevent acne outbreaks; suitable for combination and oily skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 帮助皮脂腺分泌正常, 预防粉刺生成, 适合混合性和油性皮肤使用.

sentence.Network_en: Toosebum results in greasy hairconversely, too little sebum makes dry hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 油脂含量过多会油性发质,相反, 油脂含量过少则会干性发质.

list.abs: quickly lifts away dead cells and impurities even inside pores , and excretes excessive sebum and mites , for the further anti-acne effect without flaw and pain .快速深入毛孔，清除老化角质、多余油脂、黑头、暗疮和毛囊内的螨虫，促进暗疮粉刺自然干化、脱落，平滑粗糙、凹凸，无痛不留印。

regulate sebum secretion , prevent acne outbreaks ; suitable for combination and oily skin .帮助皮脂腺分泌正常，预防粉刺生成，适合混合性和油性皮肤使用。

helps to reduce skin pores , balance sebum , tighten and reduce puffiness , reduce signs of aging . can also control dandruff and stimulate hair growth .帮助收细毛孔，收敛，平衡油脂；紧实皮肤，减轻充血、浮肿现象，防止老化；亦可改善头皮屑及刺激毛发生长。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin sebum 'grease'

entry.def: Sebum is an oily substance produced by glands in your skin.

means.word_mean: 1. the oily secretion of the sebaceous glands; with perspiration it moistens and protects the skin

auth_sentence.content: Each has a sebaceous gland that produces an oily substance, sebum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each has a sebaceous gland that produces an oily substance, sebum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each has a sebaceous gland that produces an oily substance, sebum.

auth_sentence.content: Excess production of sebum, the natural oil secreted from glands in the skin, fuels the growth of this fungus.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Excess production of sebum, the natural oil secreted from glands in the skin, fuels the growth of this fungus.

auth_sentence.content: The opening of the sebaceous gland is filled with a plug of sebum mixed with sloughed-off skin cells.
